Articles.Content:
Just landed a probe controlled base on Minmus. I clicked on crew report to see what would happen. I was able to complete a crew report and transmit without any crew on board.

Haven't seen anyone register this anomaly yet. Is this normal and acceptable?

Is this a post that should be under bugs, development? I have no idea...

All I know is that it seems I no longer need a crew to conduct crew reports.

I know you said it was probe controlled, but did you have any parts that could have contained crews (whether they were manned or not)? I know that prior to 0.90 you didn't actually need crew to generate a report, just a pod.

Yes, A 3 kerbal pod.

Just seems out of line though... creating a crew report without a crew.

Not a bug then i guess. Sorry for any confusion. You may return to your normally scheduled missions...

He said it was a base, so I assume some crew space was present. The bug is still open in the tracker, so it probably wasn't fixed yet.

http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/1635

Holy crap. A 1 year old bug still not fixed. FFS.

Thanks Mono, I'll now keep an eye on the bug tracker. ;-)
MODERATOR ----> Request thread be moved to appropriate section and also be closed since this is a legacy bug issue which was already reported.
Alright I'll move it, and I thought this bug was dealt with, oh well :/
